io.soliton.protobuf

Class EnvelopeClientHandler<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<O>
          • io.soliton.protobuf.EnvelopeClientHandler<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of the outgoing message in which the envelope is wrapped
    O - the type of the incoming message in which the envelope is wrapped
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler

    public abstract class EnvelopeClientHandler<I,O>
extends SimpleChannelInboundHandler<O>
    Base class for client-side RPC handlers that encode RPC calls in an Envelope.
    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

      protected static class  EnvelopeClientHandler.ResponseConversionException
      Occurs when a received response couldn't be converted into an Envelope.

      • convertRequest

        public abstract I convertRequest(Envelope request)
        Converts an outgoing RPC method call into the request type supported by this handler.
        Parameters:
        request - the outgoing request
        Returns:
        the converted request

      • convertResponse

        public abstract Envelope convertResponse(O response)
                                  throws EnvelopeClientHandler.ResponseConversionException
        Converts an incoming RPC response from the type supported by this handler into an Envelope.
        Parameters:
        response - the response received from the server
        Returns:
        the incoming response
        Throws:
        EnvelopeClientHandler.ResponseConversionException - in case an error happens during the conversion

      • newProvisionalResponse

        public <O extends Message> EnvelopeFuture<O> newProvisionalResponse(ClientMethod<O> clientMethod)
        Returns a new provisional handle on the future result of an RPC invocation.

        This handler will keep track of the returned object and set its response when it is received from the server.

        Parameters:
        clientMethod - the method that is intended to be invoked.

      • finish

        public ListenableFuture<? extends Message> finish(long requestId)
        Terminates the processing an RPC based on its identifier.
        Parameters:
        requestId - the identifier of the request to terminate.

      • setChannel

        public void setChannel(Channel channel)
        Sets the channel this handler will use to communicate with the remote server.
        Parameters:
        channel - a channel connected to the server

      • setClientLogger

        public void setClientLogger(ClientLogger clientLogger)
        Sets the logger this handler should report events to.
        Parameters:
        clientLogger - a client logger.

      • inFlightRequests

        public Map<Long,EnvelopeFuture<? extends Message>> inFlightRequests()
        Returns the mapping in which the RPC requests pending with the server are kept.
